A list of errors or misnominations affecting the accuracy or credibility of a scientific text, often compiled to rectify and ensure the precision of subsequent publications or references.
A notice or publication correcting a mistake or error in a previous scientific or academic work, typically specifying the incorrect or incomplete information and providing the corrected details.
A type of label or notation that indicates a mistake or inaccuracy in the written representation of a piece of information, typically in a scientific or academic context.
